content.heading: <applet> Tag
paragraphs: The <applet> tag is not supported in HTML5.

content.heading: Plug-ins
paragraphs: Plug-ins extended browser functionality (e.g., Java applets, Flash).
Most browsers no longer support plug-ins or ActiveX.

content.heading: Alternatives
paragraphs: Audio: <audio controls><source src="audio.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">Audio not supported.</audio>
Images: Use for pictures;
